note.p: Career: Demonstrator of plants to the Society of Apothecaries; Director, Chelsea Physic Garden
Proposers: Sir Hans Sloane (originally proposed 22 February 1704)
References: W H G Armytage, 'The Royal Society and the Apothecaries' in NR 1954-55 vol 11 pp 22-37
H G Lyons, 'Two Hundred Years Ago: 1739' in NR 1939 vol 2 pp 34-42
